mapper.insert: insert into find_board(board_code, nickname, title, content, readcount, pet_type, missing_date, pet_name, pet_age, pet_gender, address, address2, result, insert_date, delete_date, detail_address, reward, email) values ('f',#{nickname},"title", #{content},#{readcount},#{pet_type},#{missing_date}, #{pet_name},#{pet_age},#{pet_gender},#{address},#{address2}, #{result},#{insert_date},#{delete_date},#{detail_address},#{reward}, #{email})
update find_board_file set find_board_num = (select max(find_board_num) from find_board) where find_board_num = 0

insert into find_board_file(file_num, find_board_num, board_code, upload, filename, save_filename, file_upload_date, ext) values (#{file_num}, #{find_board_num}, #{board_code}, #{upload}, #{filename}, #{save_filename}, #{file_upload_date}, #{ext})
mapper.select: select * from find_board order by find_board_num desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select concat(upload,"\\",filename) as upload from find_board_file order by find_board_num desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select * from find_board where result = "1" order by find_board_num desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from find_board where result="1"
mapper.update: update find_board set pet_type=#{pet_type}, pet_name=#{pet_name}, pet_age=#{pet_age}, pet_gender=#{pet_gender}, missing_date=#{missing_date}, address=#{address}, address2=#{daaress2}, detail_address=#{detail_address}, content=#{content}, contact=#{contact}, where find_board_num=#{find_board_num}
mapper.select: select distinct address2 from address where address1=#{province}
select distinct address3 from address where address1=#{address1} and address2=#{address2}

select CASE WHEN b.num is not null THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS book, a.* from find_board a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM bookmark where email = #{email} ) b ON a.find_board_num = b.find_board_num order by a.insert_date desc limit 8
